title: PJM picks partners for 300 mile Midwest electric transmission project
description: PJM Interconnection has approved a 300-mile electric transmission project in central Ohio, developed by Transource Energy and FirstEnergy Transmission, that will modernize and strengthen the local grid.
content: PJM Interconnection has approved a 300-mile electric transmission project in central Ohio, developed by Transource Energy and FirstEnergy Transmission, that will modernize and strengthen the local grid.
